long_description: Lighter than its predecessor, this 4-season Therm-a-Rest ProLite Plus sleeping pad is one of the warmest, self-inflating mattresses in the Therm-a-Rest Fast & Light line. Extra insulation makes the Therm-a-rest ProLite Plus ideal for ski touring, cold-weather expeditions and winter camping. New tapered shape reduces weight by 10% from previous year. ProLite Plus is engineered with innovative diagonal die-cut foam to reduce heat loss and provide efficient insulation. Stuff sack included.
short_description: Lighter than its predecessor, this 4-season Therm-a-Rest ProLite Plus sleeping pad is one of the warmest, self-inflating mattresses in the Therm-a-Rest Fast & Light line.
